name: Extended Scrying
prerequisites: Ability to cast a spell of the scrying subschool.
benefit: Any scrying spell you cast lasts twice as long as normal, as if it were cast as an extended spell with the Extend Spell metamagic feat. Additionally, when you cast a scrying spell with a casting time of 10 minutes or longer, that casting time is halved.
text_zh: 你的探知法术持续时间更长。
prerequisites_zh: 能够施放探知（Scrying）子学派的法术。
benefit_zh: 你施放的任何探知子学派法术的持续时间是通常的两倍，如同它是通过法术延时（Extend Spell）超魔专长施放的延时法术一般。此外，当你施放施法时间为10分钟或更长的探知法术时，施放时间减半。
